channel.title: Activity on Zenith John's Nonsense
channel.description: Recent content in Activity on Zenith John's Nonsense

item.title: Enumerative Geometry Seminar, Topic: Homological Mirror Symmetry, 2022.2-2022.6
item.description: Aim Provide attendees enough information of Fukaya category and derived category of coherent sheaves to understand the main statement of homological mirror symmetry. \[D^{b}{\rm Fuk}(X) \cong D^{b}{\rm Coh}(X^{\vee})\] Also, I hope this learning seminar will give us a good chance to communicate with others in Tsinghua University, so feel free to invite others! Time and Place 2022.2-2022.6 More specific time and place to be determined. Maybe in Jinchunyuan West Building.
